downloadTitle: Microsoft IT Institute Best Practice Experience: The Cloud at Microsoft
downloadDescription: This Best Practice Experience Course covers “How Microsoft Does IT” and provides insight into how Microsoft is moving to the Cloud to support Microsoft’s 220,000 internal users. Participants will learn the best practices Microsoft has created and employed in designing, developing, deploying, and operating in the cloud for our global environment.
detailsSection: This Best Practice Experience Course covers “How Microsoft Does IT” and provides insight into how Microsoft is moving to the Cloud to support Microsoft’s 220,000 internal users. Participants will learn the best practices Microsoft has created and employed in designing, developing, deploying, and operating in the cloud for our global environment.
